pawn or queen? The queen in e5 is very well placed, and threats b2 (the bishop can be saved after Qxb2, Rb1, Qc6, etc... or so I thought).

At least. I could have retired the bishop, but I didn't want to provide so much space to white pursuing it with the pawns.
